docs.title: EDUCATION
docs.text:
Postgraduate of Surveying & Mapping Engineering (RS), 2024 (expected)

School of Land Science and Technology, China University of Geosciences Beijing (CUGB) GPA: 84.7/100 (3.21/4.0)

Bachelor of Surveying & Mapping Engineering, 2021

School of Land Science and Technology, China University of Geosciences Beijing (CUGB) GPA: 83.6/100 (3.13/4.0)

docs.title: ACADEMIC EXPERIENCE
docs.text:
• Research on Vegetation Dynamic, Climate Response and Parameter Retrieval (09/2022- present) Collaborated with a team, focusing on satellite data processing, product development and analysis, and tool development. Contributed to 2 papers currently under revision and 3 manuscripts in preparation.

  • Research on Machine Learning Methods to Predict Polar Motion (01/2022 - 09/2022) Collaborator, responsible for experiments and model refinement. Published 1 paper in RS.

  • Research on Topography Correction Methods (12/2020 - 06/2021) Collaborator responsible for experiments and data processing. Published 1 paper in GRSL.

  • Research on Navigation Technology (09/2018 - 09/2020) Team leader responsible for modeling, coding, and experimentation. Published 3 papers in Chinese journals and obtained 1 software copyright.

docs.title: PUBLICATIONS
docs.text:
• K. Yan, J. Wang, R. Peng, K. Yang, R. B. Myneni. "HiQ-LAI: A High-Quality Reprocessed MODIS LAI Dataset with 2 Better Spatio-temporal Consistency from 2000 to 2022". (in preparation)
  • K. Yang, K. Yan, X. Zhang, J. Wang et al. "Development and Evaluation of LAI/FPAR Vegetation Parameter Products Based on the FY-3D/MERSI-II". (in preparation)
  • X. Zhang, K. Yan, X. Jin, K. Yang et al. "Evaluating the Internal Consistency of MODIS C6.1 Leaf Area Index Product". (in preparation)
  • K. Yang, K. Yan, X. Zhang et al. "Assessing FY-3D MERSI-Ⅱ Observations for Vegetation Dynamics Monitoring: A Performance Test of Land Surface Reflectance". This paper is under revision in Transactions on Geoscience and Remote Sensing
  • R. Zhong, K. Yan, S. Gao, K. Yang et al. "Response of Grassland Growing Season Length to Extreme Climatic Events on the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau". This paper is under revision in Science of the Total Environment.
  • K. Yu, K. Yang, T. Shen et al. "Estimation of Earth Rotation Parameters and Prediction of Polar Motion Using Hybrid CNN–LSTM Model". Remote Sensing, 2023
  • H. Chi, K. Yan, K. Yang et al. "Evaluation of Topographic Correction Models Based on 3-D Radiative Transfer Simulation". IEEE Geoscience and Remote Sensing Letters, 2022
  • M. Yu, K. Yang, Z. Gao. "Research on the Integration of UWB /INS /NHC Aided Algorithm of Fixed Interval Smoothing Filter". Geomatics & Spatial Information Technology, 2021
  • H. Chi, K. Yang, Z. Gao et al. "Mathematical Models of GNSS PPP/INS Tightly Coupled Integration". Geomatics & Spatial Information Technology, 2019
  • H. Chi, Z. Gao, K. Yang et al. "Mathematical Models of the RTS Filter and Raw GPS+BDS Observation Based PPP/INS Tight Integration". Navigation Positioning & Timing, 2019

docs.title: INTERNSHIP
docs.text: • Linktech Navi Technology Co., Ltd, Beijing, China (06/2021 – 09/2021) Data-processing Engineer. Responsible for the data production process optimization of POI production line.

  • University-level Bronze Award in the "Challenge Cup" Capital Competition of Chinn College Students Entrepreneurship Plan Competition. (09/2020)

  • Municipal Excellence Award of College Student Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition. (06/2020)
  • Second Prize in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei College Students Surveying and Mapping Skills Competition. (07/2019)
  • University-level Second Prize in Social Practice & Outstanding Team Leader Award. (08/2018)

docs.text:
